    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    DBConnection
    Singleton class providing a single shared database connection.
    JoinDAO
    DAO interface defining methods to access postal code and EV count data Implementations of this interface handle SQL queries and return DTO objects.
    JoinDAOImpl
    Implementation of the interface.
    JoinDTO
    Represents a postal code record with electric vehicle counts.
    JoinService
    Business logic for the JOIN table (ottawapostalcodes Ã— evcounts).
    OttawaPostalDAO
    DAO interface defining methods to access postal code data Implementations of this interface handle SQL queries and return DTO objects.
    OttawaPostalDAOImpl
    Implementation of the interface.
    OttawaPostalDTO
    Represents a postal code record Acts as a Data Transfer Object (DTO) between DAO and business layers.
    OttawaPostalService
    Business logic for the OttawaPostal table.
    PostalCodeApp
    Console application entry point for Assignment 1.
